html:
12.8.23  2:09 am   im taking a music composition major for college and the piano piece i wrote apparently broke all the counterpoint rules. and now i have to learn the rights and wrongs of melodies and chords inversions and when to use them. i know you learned it all yourself, dang im hungry

      i understand

12.8.23  1:50 am   Did you jost read this in a bri-ish accent?

      no

12.8.23  12:28 am   how do i dissect/absorb a complicated drum part to a song that i really like? do i just learn and play back like 2 or 4 bars at a time?

      that might be useful. ultimately it will just click, at some other time. as an indirect result of having studied it closely, in addition to living your life normally

12.7.23  10:48 pm   how does my new shirt look?

      i have no idea how it looks, but i assume it looks pretty good based on the following reasoning: i assume that you have some control over which shirt it is, and how you wear it. and i also assume that you have pretty good judgement, because, let's face it, most people have pretty good judgement

12.7.23  9:28 pm   what if i dont have a question?

      then you wouldn't have asked this

12.7.23  8:31 pm   god. do you ever just drink sprite and enjoy it. i love sprite do you like it too

      sort of

12.7.23  7:07 pm   did you ever figure out the stars?

      no, but it's on my to do list

12.7.23  7:04 pm   how have you managed to make such an interesting style of song, speech, and visuals

      perhaps i'm cursed

12.7.23  6:32 pm   i got some special glasses and i am wearing them for my venture into the questions page

      i understand

12.7.23  5:51 pm   Ever been to Greenland?

      no

12.7.23  4:39 pm   How many characters are in this question?

      seems like about 41, but it also seems like something that would be a trick question

12.7.23  4:19 pm   Do you have a fan mail address where we can send fanmail?

     sure

     If so what is it?

     my name at my name dot com

12.7.23  4:16 pm   have you ever wanted to collaborate with anyone?

      almost

12.7.23  12:28 pm   how many questions haven't you been asked

      2 or 3

12.7.23  12:24 pm   I want to draw something but I have no idea what to draw. Give me a prompt or an idea for me to draw :) 

      band
      makeup
      keep in mind, if you hate this prompt, you also have an option to do what you wish the prompt was, which hopefully became slightly more clear as a result of the prompt

12.7.23  11:22 am   what is your favorite animal

      computer

12.7.23  11:08 am   Is there a single jazziest chord

      i don't know of any jazzy chords

12.7.23  10:41 am   what is your art consumption to art creation ratio lookin like currently

      2:8

12.7.23  9:50 am   Is being lost a matter of not knowing where you aren't?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.7.23  8:16 am   what if you could fly and then the polices tried to arrest you for being too cool while flying

      i'd tell them i didn't know, and then stop

12.7.23  8:13 am   whats the difference between a bacon burger and a bacon cheeseburger? asking for a friend...

      the bacon cheeseburger must have cheese. the bacon burger may or may not have cheese

12.7.23  7:57 am   what would you rather eat if you were given the choice: cheesecake or grilled cheese

      grilled cheese

12.7.23  7:05 am   Does art come from vulnerability 

      often

12.7.23  2:46 am   word of the day?

      day

12.7.23  2:19 am   thoughts on pipe organs?

      huge

12.7.23  2:17 am   where will the earth be located in approximately 48 years and 3 months

      approximately the same place relative to the sun as it normally is, in march. however you may have been looking for a different reference point. most of the time when people talk about location, they implicitly mean the location relative to the building they are in, or the city they are in, or even the whole planet. but when we talk about the location of the planet, of course we need an even larger frame of reference. i chose the sun by default but that may not be what you were looking for. perhaps you had in mind some absolute fixed coordinate system in space, but i don't know of such a thing. i suspect it's all entirely relative

12.7.23  12:00 am   Do you think if all the people who have asked you questions on here were put in a room together, would we become friends?

      some, not all

12.6.23  11:48 pm   what inspired you to start making music?

      music

12.6.23  11:12 pm   how to get the words out

      sing them

12.6.23  10:58 pm   How can an earnest but naive young person maintain a sense stability and serenity when everything around them seems poised to change irrevocably?

      start a journal about all the changes

12.6.23  10:44 pm   what percentage of your songs are fiction?

      maybe 75. but as with all fiction, the feelings are usually true

12.6.23  8:59 pm   when i spend too much time with the piano i feel like my progress is plateauing and i start to get demotivated. am i spending too much time with the piano? am i not spending it right? i really want to get to the point where i can comfortably improvise and play "out" but the path is so confusing and i don't even know if i'm even capable of getting there

      you could take a few days away from it. just listen to things, or watch movies, or do something else. it should feel fresher when you get back

12.6.23  8:45 pm   What do you think a volcano sounds like?

      a low frequency, high volume, rumble

12.6.23  7:31 pm   are school systems designed to be stressful

      a little

12.6.23  7:14 pm   Is science an art?

      sometimes

12.6.23  7:04 pm   if i were your intern, what would you teach me ? 

      of these 4 categories: [1. things you don't know, 2. things i do know, 3. things you want to know, 4. things i want you to know], generally it would be things in both categories 1 and 2, and either 3 or 4

12.6.23  5:41 pm   what is the definition of history?

      the past, usually including a period of time longer than about a week, anywhere up to eternity, and often pertaining to a specific thing, place, person, idea, company, or other venture, for which a story is told about its origins and development, leading up to the present day

12.6.23  4:37 pm   If you could chose a color to replace the green in all the plants in the world, what color would you choose?

      purple, and with that of course all the other colors would also be rotated around the hue dial, equally so

12.6.23  3:31 pm   i don't believe i'm a very good person and it hurts.  what could i do to cope in the meantime while i work on that 

      perhaps you could whip up some kind of webcomic, or sitcom, depicting those feelings

12.6.23  1:35 pm   in "fly around" how did you manage to make the piano sound like the word "begin" when the words begin shows up on the screen, how did you do that

      it was the other way around. i did the music first, then for the video i put the word there which matched the moment. not the exact sound per se, but it fits the context, because the song immediately begins after it, and also the syllable count is the same. those elements combined seem to have hypnotized you into thinking you were hearing the word

12.6.23  12:28 pm   when the easter bunny told you that christmas isn't real, was this a disspointment or did you already know this

      that whole scenario is fiction

12.6.23  11:20 am   do you think space travel will ever progress to a point where owning a spaceship is like owning a car? 

      maybe

12.6.23  9:59 am   school has made me think very narrowly. do i need an ivy league education to be successful and make impact in the world?

     no, in fact, for that, the world needs you

     why do i want to make an impact

     maybe you know you can, which would make it feel like a waste if you don't

12.6.23  9:22 am   Why doesn't the sun shine on the ground?

      in that case, because this would be some kind of riddle question

12.6.23  7:37 am   How to satiate my constant and unending hunger for omniscience 

      keep learning things

12.6.23  6:28 am   share some of your best smash bros fight strategies with us, please

      don't play the pieces, play the board

12.6.23  4:28 am   Why is the sky blue

      to try something new. this assumes of course that it was another color before this

12.6.23  4:24 am   What is your favourite species of fish?

      gold

12.6.23  1:28 am   Do any of your songs deal with themes of destiny or free will or both at the same time 

      surely, although not by those names

12.6.23  1:01 am   am i just imagining stuff or at some point did you say that you intentionally gave the lyrics page a harsh color palette because you don't wish for people to look at the lyrics without hearing the song 

      that seems like something i would do
